com.netflix.msl.crypto
Class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.CekCryptoContext

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.crypto.JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.CekCryptoContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICryptoContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.AesKwCryptoContext, JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.RsaOaepCryptoContext
Enclosing class:
JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext
public abstract static class JsonWebEncryptionCryptoContext.CekCryptoContext
extends Object
implements ICryptoContext

The Content Encryption Key crypto context is used to encrypt/decrypt the randomly generated content encryption key.

          Content encryption key encryption algorithm.
